mapper.insert: insert into JC_PRESCO (CODE, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME,NAME, STATUS, FH_ADDRESS, FH_DETAILEADDRESS, FH_IPHONE, FH_LTL, FH_NAME, FH_PERSON, SH_ADDRESS, SH_DETAILEADDRESS, SH_IPHONE, SH_LTL, SH_NAME, SH_PERSON, ADDRESS, COSTOMER_NAME_LS, COSTOMER_TPYE, JC_COSTOMER_ID, DATE_ACCEPTED, JZ_WEIGHT, NUMBER, JC_ORGANIZATION_ID, PICK_MILEAGE, RELATEBILL1, JC_SERVER_ZONE_ID, JC_SINGLE_ID, VALUE, VOLUME, WEIGHT, ID) values (#{presco.code}, '测试账号', #{presco.createTime}, #{presco.description}, null, null, null, '测试账号', #{presco.createTime}, null, 1, #{presco.fhAddress}, #{presco.fhDetaileaddress}, #{presco.fhIphone}, #{presco.fhLtl}, #{presco.fhName}, #{presco.fhPerson}, #{presco.shAddress}, #{presco.shDetaileaddress}, #{presco.shIphone}, #{presco.shLtl},#{presco.shName}, #{presco.shPerson}, null, '测试', #{presco.costomerTpye}, '402881a767153e1c016715cd3bd70141', #{presco.createTime}, #{presco.jzWeight}, 1, '402881a36710579c016710c4e2fb0230', #{presco.pickMileage}, #{presco.relatebill1}, '297edff8679616a2016796d8849d02c1', null, #{presco.value}, #{presco.volume}, #{presco.weight}, #{presco.id})

insert into JC_RECEIVINGPARTY (CREATE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, NAME, STATUS, ADDRESS, CONTACTPERSON, DETAILE_ADDRESS, FACT_ARRIVE_TIME, FACT_LEAVE_TIME, IPHONE, LTL, ORDERBY, JC_ORGANIZATION_ID, PLAN_LEAVE_TIME, REQUIRE_ARRIVE_TIME, JC_ZONE_ID, ID) values ('测试账号', #{receivingparty.createTime},#{receivingparty.description} , null, null, null, null, null,#{receivingparty.name}, 1, #{receivingparty.address}, #{receivingparty.contactperson}, #{receivingparty.detaileAddress}, null, null, #{receivingparty.iphone}, #{receivingparty.ltl}, 0, '402881a36710579c016710c4e2fb0230', null, null, null, #{receivingparty.id})
